karmanthaya pihituwimata adala bhumiyehi sudusu bawa pariksha kirime di yojitha bhumiya ayath wana pradeshaye palath palana aayathanayehi kalapa salasuma, awata idam wala bhawithaya, aarakshana kalapayak sandaha yoda gatha haki bhumiyehi pramanaya, amathara apadrawya pramanayak dara ganimata pradeshayata athi hakiyawa saha apadrawya bahara kirime awashyathawa yana karunu kerehi pradhana washayen awadhanaya yomu kere.

eewa pitapath karagannatayayi nahimiyan mata bhara dunha. 29wana da madawala pansalata giya awasthawehi hamuduruwan kiwe ehi thibuna wishala pothgula bi්rathanya hamudawa wisin 1817di mulumanin ma winasha kala bawayi. wayi. ke. thissa bandarapusthakalayadhikari, buddhashrawaka bhikshu wishwawidyalaya, anuradhapuraya padaka satahan ha antha lipi aananda kulasuriya (1996), puskola poth ha lekhana kalawa, sanskruthika puranaya, 2wana weluma, 1 kalapaya, sans. ti. ji. kulathunga, kolambaa, madhyama sanskruthika aramudala.
ee nisa apa me aanduwa, maha sangharathnaya athulu siyaludena illa sitinne me kriyadamaya waha nathara karanna kiyalayi.
